description: Add 'msp-i18n-enabled' boolean feature flag (default: false) to DEFAULT_BOOLEAN_FLAGS
Standard MSP server layout checks flag and fetches locale via getHierarchicalLocaleAction only when enabled
Standard MspLayoutClient conditionally wraps children in I18nWrapper when flag is enabled
Standard MspLayoutClient renders without I18nWrapper when flag is disabled (zero behavior change)
EE MSP layout checks flag and fetches locale when enabled
EE MspLayoutClient conditionally wraps children in I18nWrapper when flag is enabled
Create features/tickets.json for all 7 languages by extracting tickets.* from clientPortal.json (flattened, no wrapper key)
Create features/projects.json for all 7 languages by extracting projects.* from clientPortal.json
Create features/billing.json for all 7 languages by extracting billing.* from clientPortal.json
Create features/documents.json for all 7 languages by extracting documents.* from clientPortal.json
Create features/appointments.json for all 7 languages by extracting appointments.* from clientPortal.json
Create client-portal/core.json for all 7 languages (nav, dashboard, common, pagination, time keys from clientPortal.json)
Create client-portal/auth.json for all 7 languages (auth, account keys from clientPortal.json)
Create client-portal/profile.json for all 7 languages (profile, clientSettings, notifications keys from clientPortal.json)
Migrate all client portal components using tickets.* keys to useTranslation('features/tickets')
Migrate all client portal components using projects.* keys to useTranslation('features/projects')
Migrate all client portal components using billing.* keys to useTranslation('features/billing')
Migrate all client portal components using documents.* keys to useTranslation('features/documents')
Migrate all client portal components using appointments.* keys to useTranslation('features/appointments')
Migrate client portal components using nav/dashboard/common/pagination/time keys to useTranslation('client-portal/core')
Migrate client portal components using auth/account keys to useTranslation('client-portal/auth')
Migrate client portal components using profile/clientSettings/notifications keys to useTranslation('client-portal/profile')
Remove or empty clientPortal.json after all components are migrated â€” no duplication
Create msp/core.json for English with nav items from menuConfig.ts, sidebar labels, header actions, and settings tab names
Create msp/core.json for all 6 non-English languages (machine-translated placeholders)
Add personal language preference section to UserProfile component (/msp/profile), gated by useFeatureFlag('msp-i18n-enabled')
Personal language preference uses existing LanguagePreference component with showNoneOption for fallback to org default
Create MspLanguageSettings component (mirrors ClientPortalSettings language section) with default language dropdown and enabled languages checkboxes
Add MspLanguageSettings to Settings > General > Organization & Access section, after Teams, gated by feature flag
Org MSP language settings persist to tenant_settings (mspPortal.defaultLocale and mspPortal.enabledLocales)
Create server actions for reading/writing MSP org locale settings (getTenantMspLocaleSettings, updateTenantMspLocaleSettings)
Extend getHierarchicalLocaleAction to include MSP org default in resolution chain (user > msp org default > system default) for internal users
All new namespace JSON files are valid with no duplicate keys, consistent structure across all 7 languages
